# Data and Score
-->

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
options(digits = 3)
class_roll <- readRDS("./class_roll231127.RDS")
att <- class_roll[c("id", "name")]
att$q01 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz230828.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q02 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz230904.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q03 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz230911.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q04 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz230918.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q05 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz230925.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q06 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231002.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q07 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231009.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q08 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231016.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q09 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231023.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q10 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231030.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q11 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231106.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q12 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231113.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$q13 <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./quiz231120.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$BFI <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./BFI231106.RDS")$ID, 1, 0)
att$MI <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./MI231106.RDS")$ID, 1, 0)
# att$CRT <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./crt191104.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$food_b <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./food_before2302.rds")$id, 1, 0)
att$food_a <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./food_after2302.rds")$id, 1, 0)
# att$gorilla <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./gorilla2101.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$literacy <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./literacy_roll230925.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
#att$matching <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./matching191125.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$oxford <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./oxford231016.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
# att$reading <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./reading190925.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
# att$world <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./which_world200430.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$MW <- ifelse(att$id %in% readRDS("./MW231113.RDS")$id, 1, 0)
att$total <- apply(att[, -(1:2)], MARGIN = 1, sum, na.rm = TRUE) * 10 / 20
# str(att)                  
pander(att[order(att$id, att$name), -2], row.names = FALSE)
# pander(att[order(att$name, att$id), c("id", "name", "total")], row.names = FALSE)
```
